name: Basic Buttermilk Muffins
author: DCKatie
summary: This is a great basic muffin batter that can be adapted to almost anything.
directions: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups, or line with paper muffin liners
Sift together the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg
In a separate bowl, whisk together the melted butter, egg, buttermilk, and vanilla
Pour the buttermilk mixture into the dry ingredients and stir just until mixed (the batter will not be smooth)
Gently stir in fruit, if desired (see Cook's Note)
Scoop the batter into the prepared muffin tins; fill the cups almost to the top
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and the tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 18 minutes
